data.expected_result: The menu should close and show the original server channel you were in before opening settings.
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap the three dots on a sever you have admin perms to. - Select “Server Settings”. - Navigate to “Channels”. - Open the settings to an existing channel. - Proceed to quickly close the menu via, Close —> Back —> Close.  - Must be executed in quick fashion.
